subject: inequality
question:
If 'P' means '>', 'Q' means '<', 'R' means '≥', 'S' means '≤', and 'T' means '=', then evaluate:
Statement 1: If 3x S 2y and 4x T 5z, then 6y P 5z
Statement 2: If 2x Q y and 3y R 4z, then x Q 2z
Which of the statements is/are true? (1 only/2 only/Both/Neither)

subject: data_sufficiency
question:
What is the present age of X?
Statement 1: Five years ago, X was twice as old as Y.
Statement 2: After ten years, Y will be half of X's age.
Which statement alone is sufficient? (1 only/2 only/Both needed/Neither)

subject: data_sufficiency
question:
Is x² > y²?
Statement 1: x > y
Statement 2: x + y > 0
Which statement alone is sufficient? (1 only/2 only/Both needed/Neither)

subject: data_sufficiency
question:
What is the profit percentage on an article?
Statement 1: Selling price is 120% of cost price.
Statement 2: Cost price is ₹500.
Which statement alone is sufficient? (1 only/2 only/Both needed/Neither)

subject: permutation

subject: probability

subject: probability

subject: probability
question: A speaks truth in 70% cases and B speaks truth in 60% cases. What is the probability that they contradict each other in stating a fact? (0.46/0.48/0.52/0.54)

subject: time_work
question: A can complete a work in 10 days, B in 15 days. They work together for 5 days, then A leaves. In how many more days will B complete the remaining work? (2.5 days/3 days/3.5 days/4 days)

subject: time_work
question: A is thrice as efficient as B and takes 60 days less than B to complete a work. In how many days can they together complete the work? (22.5 days/25 days/27.5 days/30 days)

subject: time_work
question: Three pipes A, B, C can fill a tank in 20, 30, and 40 minutes respectively. All three are opened together, but after 5 minutes, pipe A is closed. How much more time is needed to fill the tank? (6.5 min/7.5 min/8.5 min/9.5 min)

subject: time_distance

subject: time_distance
question: Two trains start simultaneously from stations A and B towards each other. They meet at a point and take 4 hours and 9 hours respectively to reach their destinations. How much time did they take to meet? (5 hours/6 hours/7 hours/8 hours)

subject: mixture
